solution_line_template: The original amount is ${full_amount} so half is ${full_amount}/{half_divisor} = $<<{full_amount}/{half_divisor}={half_amount}>>{half_amount}
{students_paid_half} students paid half (${half_amount}) for a total of {students_paid_half}*${half_amount} = $<<{students_paid_half}*{half_amount}={total_from_half_payers}>>{total_from_half_payers}

{students_paid_full} students paid the full amount (${full_amount}) for a total of {students_paid_full}*${full_amount} = $<<{students_paid_full}*{full_amount}={total_from_full_payers}>>{total_from_full_payers}
They were able to gather a total of ${total_from_half_payers}+${total_from_full_payers} = $<<{total_from_half_payers}+{total_from_full_payers}={total_gathered}>>{total_gathered}
